title: Most followed EPL team in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 20 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 32.0 is found at Response Manchester United and the minimum is found at Bournemouth where Response is 0.0.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Response Manchester United and minimum Response Bournemouth.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 32.0 is found at Response Manchester United and the minimum is found at Bournemouth where Response is 0.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Manchester United and lowest at Response Bournemouth.
Response Liverpool has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The Share of respondents of Response Manchester United is 3200000000000.0% larger than the minimum value at Bournemouth.
Response Manchester United is higher than any other Responses with value 32.0, followed by Liverpool, and Manchester City. Down to Response Bournemouth with the lowest value 0.0.

Similar Share of respondents is found in Response Aston Villa, Brighton & Hove Albion, Burnley, Everton, Leicester City, Norwich City, Sheffield United, Southampton, Watford, West Ham United, and Wolverhamption Wanderers.
The highest value 32.0 at Manchester United is almost 7.62 times larger than the average value 4.2.
The Share of respondents is 84.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
